name: Defeating Father Nature
description:
———DEFEATING FATHER NATURE———
DFN is a classic 2D platformer styled game. It throws you straight into challenging levels filled with puzzles and action. Kicking you into the quest to defeat Father Nature, the banished other half of mother nature who casted itself into a dark life-form, thus taking over a distant planet for its own reign of terror on the world. It's your job to defeat him!
Collect piles of gold along the way and earn extra lives to survive longer!

——FEATURES——
-Starting with 12 challenging and puzzling levels
-Multiple character and weapon upgrades
-An epic adventure
-Much more to discover!
